blog.name: supermegahijabi
blog.title: I Am Tired 3000 ‎⎊
blog.description: Muslim | 20 | A “Meh” Blog | Mostly Marvel Stuff | I love Tony Stark |

summary: The one (1) good thing about Tony’s death for us Tony stans is that we won’t have to see him suffer anymore.

blog.name: just-my-fandom
blog.title: "You guys are losers,"
blog.description:
All requests opened ;
I write for Harry Potter, Marvel, Criminal Minds, Sherlock Holmes, Voltron, FNAF, HTTYD and Stranger Things

summary:
OKAY LAST ONE I SWEAR BEFORE MY AVENGERS BREAK
Request; okay but i cant be the only one just craving for some tony stark. can...
body:
Smooth (Tony Stark x Reader)

OKAY LAST ONE I SWEAR BEFORE MY AVENGERS BREAK

Request; okay but i cant be the only one just craving for some tony stark. can you please write something for him with kissing?! weird, i know

Warnings; Steamy shit. Not full on smut but close *pinches fingers together*

Takes place back towards a little after Age Of Ultron. Backstory, reader was almost killed but Tony had saved her in time, yet Tony still has nightmares of the negative side to the incident

__________________________________________

“This is the third night this week I’ve found you here,”

Tony picks up a rag and wipes his oil stained hands, turning in his rolling chair to face the female standing at his lab door,

“Yeah, well,” Tony breathes in deeply, meeting your eyes, “Hard to sleep, thought I’d work on the suit,”

You cross your arms, sighing, and you step into the lab, the coldness of the flooring making your bare feet feel like ice,

“This can’t become an every night thing, Tony,” You run a hand through Tonys slick hair, tugging on the locks so his head tilted to look up at you,

“It won’t,” Tony raises a hand, “I promise,”

“Yeah, well,” You mock, Tony leaning back in his seat when you grasp his shoulders, slowly easing yourself onto his lap, “You have a terrible reputation when it comes to keeping promises,”

Tony narrows his eyes up at you, dropping the rag on the table next to him and planting his hands firmly at your thighs, your shorts riding up,

“Just answer this one question,” You lean back slightly, Tony drawing his eyes to your face, “Is it the nightmares again?”

Tony presses his lips together, nodding slightly, “I always see you falling off the building,” He closes his eye’s, allowing you to drag his head to rest at your chest, his arms fully eveloping you to where your shirt bunched up,

“Hey,” You brush your lips to Tonys forehead, fingers knotting in his black locks, “I’m alright. I promise,” Your lips tug upwards, “And I hold my promises,”

Tony leans away, your hands coming up to his face, pulling him forward to connect your lips with his,

Tony hums against your mouth, hands pressing flat to your back and sliding up your shirt, pulling back long enough to pull off the clothing item,

You press your mouth to his jaw, fingers tugging at his own tee shirt in hopes he would get the hint,

Tony raises his arms, giving you permission to peel his shirt over his head, tossing it behind you as your hands connect to his shoulders, hips rolling forward so his own hands were forced to meet with your thighs,

Tony groans against your mouth, hearing you chuckle and he heaves a breath, teeth pulling at your bottom lip,

“You really want to this now?”

You pull back, flicking your eyebrows up, giving him an answer, where Tony stands up, hands sliding to your lower thighs as he turns, resting you on the lab table behind him,

You lift your hips, his fingers tugging your shorts down and dropping them at his feet, your own hands grabbing at his belt buckle of his jeans, tugging him forward so your hips met and your fingers are fumbling with the loop,

Tony connects his lips to your neck, sucking, hearing you exhale and tilt your head back, his mouth raising to under your eat, licking at the next mark he left,

Tony raises his head, leaning forward and you close your eyes. Just before your lips could rejoin, though, you pause, leaning away and smiling at the confusion in Tonys orbs,

“Bed, now,” You release his belt, Tonys eyebrows raising,

“You’re serious?” You nod once, jumping off the desk and picking up your shorts,

“Dead serious. Come to bed and maybe you can have it before you go to sleep,” You give him your signature eyebrow raise, and as you walk around him, Tony places a hand at your bare bottom, lips now at your ear,

“You’re playing dirty, sweetheart,”

You chuckle, reaching behind you to pat his own butt, “If it gets you to sleep I’ll do anything,”

Tonys eyes follow you as you make your way up the stairs, his head falling back as he groans deep in his throat, picking up his shirt and yours, balling them in his fists,

“Jarvis, take the night off,”

“Will do, sir,”

blog.name: askthesuperhusbands
blog.title: Ask the SuperHusbands
blog.description: Hello everyone!! Steve now just discovered what tumblr was and asked me if we can try it out. So thus, here we are! You can ask us anything your little hearts desire! We do accept magic annons as well! We hope you all have fun asking us these questions!!

summary: Tony: “Nooooo no no! Everyone is alive I assure you my dear annon. Aunt May is like family to us since she of course is related...
caption:
Tony: “Nooooo no no! Everyone is alive I assure you my dear annon. Aunt May is like family to us since she of course is related to Peter by blood. With Pietro and Wanda they are well. Vision and Wanda actually live with each other.”

Steve: “Yeah, I know it can be tricky to differentiate the movie from what really goes on. But I assure you we will continue to answer your questions!”

blog.name: ao3feed-tonystark
blog.title: Ao3-Feed: Tony Stark
blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: The White of Your Eye
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2JHidBI

by Britt_pknapp

When Steve Rogers was born, the first thing his mother noticed was that his right eye, his soul eye, was a cloudy white colour. Sarah Rogers knew that could only mean that Steve’s soulmate was dead before he’d been born.
—
Growing up, Bucky always knew he was different. His soulmate was dead, probably long before Bucky had been born. His right eye was a mess of dead looking white and cloudy appearance that made him seem partially blind. He knew it wasn’t normal. His little sister Becca had the warmest shade of brown offsetting her own blue, and his best friend Sam had the opposite, with a blue hazel soul eye to compare to his own dark brown iris.

Words: 7709, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, Captain America - All Media Types
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: James “Bucky” Barnes, Steve Rogers, Sam Wilson (Marvel), Tony Stark, Nick Fury, Brock Rumlow
  • Relationships: James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe - Soulmates, Soulmate-Identifying Marks, Captain America Steve Rogers, Modern Bucky Barnes, Captain America Steve Rogers/Modern Bucky Barnes, Fluff, Light Angst, But Really It’s Just Fluff, Bucky Is Crazy Smart, Bucky Just Needs A Nap, Steve makes a good pillow, Suicidal Thoughts, sorta - Freeform, more like, acceptance of death


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2JHidBI

body:

Actual parent: Tony, Logan

Wine aunt: T’Challa, Anne, Eddie, Ellie

Good at babysitting: Ned, Yukio, Liz, Betty, Dan

Mediocre at babysitting: Peter, MJ, Shuri, Gwen, Flash

The house is on fire, god is dead: Harley, Harry, Wade, Riri, Laura

blog.name: askthesuperhusbands
blog.title: Ask the SuperHusbands
blog.description: Hello everyone!! Steve now just discovered what tumblr was and asked me if we can try it out. So thus, here we are! You can ask us anything your little hearts desire! We do accept magic annons as well! We hope you all have fun asking us these questions!!

summary: Tony: “He told me the day after he discovered that Hydra messed with Barnes mind. It did hurt me at first ,  my emotions we’re...
caption:
Tony: “He told me the day after he discovered that Hydra messed with Barnes mind. It did hurt me at first ,  my emotions we’re all over the place I didnt even want to speak to anyone . So I decided to stay in my Malibu house for a good month. Throughout the month, I went over everything and I have come to terms with the fact that it wasn’t Barnes fault. It was Hydra’s and I can’t blame him.”

Steve: “The movie went a different route for the plot to add more drama. I don’t agree with it but what matters is that my family is in a good place. I love my partner and I love my best friend as well. I’m glad we were all able to move past this and grow stronger together.”

blog.description: Loki, Tom Hiddleston, Tony Stark, Robert Downey Jr., Peter Parker, Thor and some other Marvel characters

summary:
So I thought a lot about Endgame and how we should move on and everything (I know it’s hard!).
And there simply has to be a new...
body:
So I thought a lot about Endgame and how we should move on and everything (I know it’s hard!).

And there simply has to be a new Iron Man!!!

So here are my favorites who could replace Iron Man:

This guy:

Or that one:

I also like him:

Or what about a woman this time?

And what do you think about that one?

I like his smile:

He would also be a good choice:

Who do you like best? 🤗
